name: My Spirit Animal 2
description:
In My Spirit Game, you have to manage two entities in order to solve the puzzles. You can control the big sloth mech by pressing buttons or switching levers with your inner entity (a cute tiny sloth).

Originally submitted to a 48-hours game jam, the Pizza Jam, this little game was inspired by one of the 7 deadly sins, Sloth. You will see why! (unless you are too lazy to hit the play button!! haha)

How to play:

- WASD or Arrow Keys to walk

- SPACE to jump

- Press F to interact

- TAB to hide or show the head.

- if you use a controller, left analog stick to move, A to jump, X to interact.

Team:

Graphics/Sound and Game design: Nielisson

Programming: alcedine
